rukus.text: Vos non realize ut everyone caelum terra glorifies DEUS et birds prout they fly column? Each knows its prayer its glorification. DEUS EST fully aware de everything they PERFECIT
To DEUS belongs sovereignty de caelum terra to DEUS est ultimus destiny

Vos non realize ut DEUS drives clouds perfecit tunc gathers them unus tunc piles them on each alius tunc vos vide rain advenit them? He sends caelum loads snow cover whomever He testimentum dum diverting it ex whomever He testimentum! brightness snow fere blinds eyes
DEUS controls NOX FERIA. Hoc est lesson those possess eyes
Deus created omnis vivens creature ex aqua! Some de them walk their bellies some walk 2 legs some walk 4. DEUS creates whatever He TESTIMENTUM. DEUS est Omnipotent
Nos sent vos clarifying revelations tunc DEUS guides whoever testimentum guided straight path
They dictus Nos believe in DEUS messenger nos obey tunc some de them slide back afterwards! These est believers
When they invited DEUS His messenger scabinus them some de them upset
Si judgment est their favor they readily accept it
est ibi morbus their hearts Est they doubtful? Est they afraid ut DEUS His messenger treat them unfairly? In fact, est they est unjust
